text: What’s the deal with the severe limitation on the RTE in Custom objects/ objects in general? It’s even worse than the one used in hubdb — You can’t even set different headings in it?

In case you missed it - *TOMORROW is HubSpot.Extend(), our flagship conference for developers!!*

If you’re building, customizing, integrating, and developing on HubSpot the HubSpot.Extend() conference is for you—streaming right into whatever space you call your office!

Attendees will learn new techniques and tips in bite-sized workshops, dig into technical topics during breakout sessions from product and community experts, and enjoy plenty of opportunities to connect with like-minded developers around the world. Plus, we’ll have exciting announcements during the keynote you won’t want to miss.

Starts tomorrow at 9 AM Eastern, don't miss it!

Join us to talk more about it with your fellow attendees in <#CCGU4R4ER|extend>!

:sprocket-dance: <https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-HubSpot-global-presents-HubSpotextend/|Register Now>:sprocket-dance:
